fields.title: Welcome
fields.message: Welcome to the Faculty of Land and Food Systems TA Application form.
fields.notice:
• Did you know you must be registered in at least one course during the term you will be TA'ing?
  • Be sure you are aware of all requirements for being a TA in the Faculty of Land and Food Systems (particularly the term/duration of TA appointments).
  • Refer to 'Information for TA's' and other sections in the LFS TA Portal: http://blogs.ubc.ca/lfsta/
